DEFAULT_DESCRIPTION: Press ENTER to load this save file. Type 'delete' and press ENTER to delete this save file.

MENU_ITEMS.title: GO BACK
MENU_ITEMS.description: Return to the main menu. Press ENTER.

MENU_ITEMS.title: NEW GAME
MENU_ITEMS.description: Start a new game. Type the name you would like to give to the save file and press ENTER.
